content: 3 knit rounds 2 to 5 knit fifth increase round 1 k7 kfb repeat to eor 198 sts part 6 edging with c3 rounds 2 to 5 knit knit one round and bind off loosely sixth increase round 1 k6 yo repeat to eor 231 sts rounds 2 to 5 knit finishing weave in ends and block for best results enjoy the knit web https //yarnz2go myshopify com/ email yarnz2go@gmail com ravelry petrabreakstone © petra breakstone enjoy your project~ page 2 of 2
